dict.acceptation: 谋杀；杀戮；极艰难[令人沮丧]的经历；

sent.orig: At the entry for "kill", my thesaurus lists"murder", "assassinate"and "waste".
sent.trans: 我的同义词词典在kill条目中列出murder，assassinate，waste词条。

sent.orig: Second Degree Murder: Any felony murder not a first degree murder.
sent.trans: 二级谋杀：不属于一级谋杀的任何重罪杀害。

sent.orig: Second Degree Murder: Any premeditated murder or felony murder that does not involve special circumstances.
sent.trans: 二级谋杀：任何不设计特殊情况的预谋伤害或者重罪杀害。

sent.orig: "Murder? "? Dursley blanched and let the umbrella fall. "What murder? "
sent.trans: “谋杀？”德思礼脸色发白，放下了雨伞。“什么谋杀？”

sent.orig: No, I think not. Rather too vegetarian. It must be murder-red-blooded murder-with trimmings, of course.
sent.trans: 不，都太小儿科了。一定得是谋杀，血淋淋的谋杀，不过要做得干净利落。
